p: Analytical‐grade ethanol, petroleum ether, ethyl acetate, and n‐butanol were purchased from Sinopharm Chemical Reagent Corporation. Chromatographic grade acetonitrile was purchased from Tedia Company Inc. Diaion HP‐20 macroporous adsorption resin was purchased from Beijing Green Herbs Co., Ltd. Mushroom tyrosinase (E.C.1.14.18.1), L‐tyrosine, and standards of arbutin and p‐coumaric acid ethyl ester were purchased from Merck Life Science Co., Ltd. Camellia pollen was purchased from Beijing Tong Ren Tang Co., Ltd.
